text:
Zoosk Inc. | San Francisco, CA | Full-time | On-site

Zoosk is a leading online dating company that personalizes the dating experience to help singles find the person and relationship that’s just right for them. Our Behavioral Matchmaking technology is constantly learning from the actions of over 35 million members in order to deliver better matches in real time, making Zoosk a market leader in mobile dating.

Check out our engineering blog at: https://about.zoosk.com/en/engineering-blog/

Roles:

     » Software Engineer, JavaScript

     » Software Engineer, Cloud API/Services

     » CI/CD Automation Engineer

     » Payments & Risk Manager

     » Digital Marketing Analyst

     » Content Strategist
All positions offer a competitive salary, equity, and comprehensive benefits. Learn more at https://about.zoosk.com/en/careers/

→ Interested in a role? Email laurag@zoosk.com [mention HackerNews] ←
